mapper.update: update clarksons_table set clarksons_table_name = #{clarksonsTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clarksons_table_url = #{clarksonsTableUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clarksons_table_category = #{clarksonsTableCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clarksons_table_database_en = #{clarksonsTableDatabaseEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clarksons_table_database_ch = #{clarksonsTableDatabaseCh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, download_enabled = #{downloadEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, download_status = #{downloadStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, download_schedule_interval = #{downloadScheduleInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER} where clarksons_table_id = #{clarksonsTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select clarksons_table_id, clarksons_table_name, clarksons_table_url, clarksons_table_category, clarksons_table_database_en, clarksons_table_database_ch, download_enabled, download_status, download_schedule_interval from clarksons_table where clarksons_table_id = #{clarksonsTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select clarksons_table_id, clarksons_table_name, clarksons_table_url, clarksons_table_category, clarksons_table_database_en, clarksons_table_database_ch, download_enabled, download_status, download_schedule_interval from clarksons_table
